Notes

Recorded August 17 & 18, 1977 at YAMAHA Hall/Sapporo Mixed September 12, 1977 at AOI Studios/Tokyo. Original release: Manufactured & distributed by Trio Records, Tokyo Comes with an obi and a black and white insert.
